data.name: Negative Labs
data.description: Negative Lab is a creative studio that designs brands, digital products and websites operated by Leo and Jörg Merz.

data.name: Tatjana Stürmer
data.description: Tatjana Stürmer (*1993) is an artist and (graphic) designer based in Frankfurt, DE, and Amsterdam, NL. In her work she moves between design practice and multimedia installations. They often revolve around the performativity of (visual) language and investigate how it shapes our social and political experiences. She is currently lecturer and associated researcher at the University of Arts and Design Offenbach (HfG) in the Department of Arts – Graphics  Illustration.

description.text: Streaming and media production company.

data.shortdescription: Set up due to the high demand for streaming during covid we set up this media production company with core members of the Vienna Struggle Association.

data.name: Contractor

description.text: Working with architects, designers and engineers I help craft visualisations and interactive concepts for a leading Swiss trade show design agency. My work included render farm optimisation, creative direction and project management.

data.shortdescription: Visualisations, construction planing and design of trade show stands.

description.text:
I do contract work as a creative, digital consultant, producer and developer. I implemented agile workflows and design thinking in interdisciplinary teams and help shape early ideas for many years. 

My role is usually the one that you are currently missing.

data.shortdescription: I do contract work as a creative, digital consultant, producer and developer.

data.company: Vienna Struggle - Association for artistic hybrid endevours

description.text: We founded Vienna Struggle to support hybrid creative work and explore new ways of collaboration in the arts, music and virtual production. We apply design thinking, collectivism and mutual respect to elevate one another and overcome the struggle of creative production together.

data.shortdescription: We founded Vienna Struggle to support hybrid creative work and explore new ways of collaboration in the arts, music and virtual production.
Developing interactive language learning class rooms and learning materials.

data.name: CTO
data.shortdescription: Digital design studio for trade show and interaction design

data.name: UI/UX architect

description.text: Tilman worked as a frontend developer and UI/UX architect and consultant for major Austrian and international clients. They developed state of the art interfaces for internal operations optimising workflows and accessibility across millions of products, supply chains. As a UI/UX consultant they helped find surprisingly easy solutions across departments and applications developing design systems, frameworks and architectures.
Frontend developer
API design. Developing prototypes, design systems and integrations of third party applications.
UI/UX architect
guide and direct tech stack, setup CI/CD, data modelling, quality control, guidance and on-boarding across large scale legacy projects as well as rebuilds and micro services.
Consultant
help clients find smart and easy solutions to their complex problems. estimate large scale project budgets and apply STIs for performance and measurement
Requirements engineering
breaking down milestones and defining atomar tasks in an agile team to accelerate  integration of business logic and assure product quality and team health.

data.shortdescription: Tilman worked as a frontend developer and UI/UX architect and consultant for major Austrian and international clients.

description.text:
Animated avant-garde festival website about arts & dark matter research in Munich (Germany) and Canfranc (Spain).

We build a figma playground for the experimental graphics to fuse seemlessly with the simplistic structure and animated particles effects in THREE.js
A community webradio website packed with key features such as 24/7 stream, heavy rotation player, live chat & unique explore algorithm to discover new shows.

EDMT is a truly unique visual music App! Designed by media artist Fader, it allows you to ‘play’ with your phone or tablet to generate mind expanding graphics and EDM inspired sounds. He is combining years of his experience as a visual and software designer into one amazing experience.

https://youtu.be/3SKECihPefU

Webshop for large cooperative Austrian DIY market. My work included frontend architecture, UX  consulting, and frontend lead.
Client: foryouandyourcustomers GmbH

data.name: Fourth Garden - Jan Van Eyck Academy

description.text: Gamified video chat rooms and virtual exhibition space for Jan Van Eyck Academy Maastricht.
Complex customizer, marketing page and beautique WooCommerce shop for Zürich based furniture business.
Beautique shopify webshop for Stuttgart based product design company.

Mailchimp style tool for designers and developers to optimize workflow for SAP Hyrbis and Bloomreach Experience emails templates. Mantain versioning across solutions between designers in figma, frontend developers and backend engineers.

Drafted by the Sagemeister decibel Manuel Bürger we realized a super minimalistic catalog for our favourite art book publishing house operated by what was formerly known as ShakeYourTree, Florian Bayer, Sebastian Haslauer and Manuel Bürger himself. We combined 90s web aesthetics and modern technologies to create a Emirate Airlines like shopping experience. Learn to fly.

B2B shop for largest Austrian farmers cooperative RWA. 
My role involved planning of the shop and portal, requirements engineering, consulting on UIUX and frontend architecture.
Client: foryouandyourcustomers Wien GmbH
Promotional browser game about the heartship of living in London in a post colonial reality.

Muriquee was a community prototype for moving creatives and musicians to book and arrange events world wide organized by legendary Berlin based club loophole. A unique geolocation based google maps overlay made it possible for digital nomads to find promoters, bookers or artists along their tours on specific dates.
Collection of individually designed micro pages to share on social networks with a strong focus on external embedding and eye catching typography.

Online platform for Austrian feminist business leader platform. I was instructed to setup up custom video chat rooms, lobby and apply their corporate identity to everything. On this project I collaborated with American service provider daily.co.

Client: 
business riot GmbH, Vienna
IoT device web interface for mirror head projector.
Animated avant-garde arts festival & residency about dark matter research laboratorium Canfranc (Spain).
Complete radio station WebApp for Vienna based community radio.
